description:
Doug Gottlieb filling in for Colin


Drew Brees lacks empathy and timing

There has to be a reason the NBA seems to want to play in the Fall

Doug's top 5 potential NBA Finals matchups


Guest: Jim Jackson, FOX Sports NBA Analyst
